title: How to pray the 4 rakahs after Friday prayer, what is the Sunnah?
transcript: and muhammad from the us yes my question is about the friday prayer i used to pray uh in the masjid the prayer to how many rakaats we pray and how we pray okay i will answer inshallah but from the u.s what is the sunnah after friday prayer well when you go to the masjid and you listen to the two sermons and then the imam offers in the congregation two raka's of jummah afterwards the sunnah is either you pray after finishing your atkar and moving away from your prayer position either you pray two by two in the masjid so you pray two units salam another two units or you don't pray anything you go home and you pray only two raka's this is what the prophet hassam used to do
